titleStmt.title: The case of William Eyres, esq. concerning his estate in Ireland, truly stated and humbly presented to the kings most excellent Majesty and both Houses of Parliament.
titleStmt.author: Eyre, William, of Shelelah, Ireland.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to William Eyre. Cf. Wing (2nd ed.).
Place and date of publication suggested by Wing (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in: Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
